title: Teen shot in arm in Birmingham, in stable condition
content:
Birmingham Police have confirmed a 15-year-old was shot in the arm in Gate City, and is in stable condition. (abc3340.com)
BIRMINGHAM, Ala. — Birmingham police confirm a teenager was shot in the arm Saturday night.
The shooting victim walked to a Birmingham Fire and Rescue station where he stated he was shot in Gate City, according to Sgt. Shelton with Birmingham police.
The victim has been transported to Children's Hospital and is in stable condition.
Birmingham police do not have a description of the suspect at this time.
ABC 33/40 will update this story as more information is made available.
Watch ABC 33/40 News at 10 for the latest.
